name: Kick Birb
description:
Destroy the imposter eggs before they destroy your nest!

-

KickBirb is currently in its early developmental stages, feel free to leave feedback! 

IN DEVELOPMENT

Settings: 

- Option to exit the game

- Volume, sensitivity and invert options

UI:

- Weight bar's label

- A better indication of the egg being damaged

- More obvious implementation of the 'Field Guide'

Animation:

- Kick animation

- A better indication of a nest breaking apart

SPECIAL THANKS

Dian Yang, for the guidance and advice.

Joel, for the endless hours of troubleshooting and help.
